/*! ========================================================= * Black Dashboard React v1.0.0 ========================================================= * Product Page: https://www.creative-tim.com/product/black-dashboard-react * Copyright 2019 Creative Tim (https://www.creative-tim.com) * Licensed under MIT (https://github.com/creativetimofficial/black-dashboard-react/blob/master/LICENSE.md) * Coded by Creative Tim ========================================================= * The above copyright notice and this permission notice shall be included in all copies or substantial portions of the Software. */ import React from "react"; // nodejs library that concatenates classes import classNames from "classnames"; // reactstrap components import { Button, ButtonGroup, Card, CardHeader, CardBody, CardTitle, Row, Col, Table, FormGroup, Input, Modal, } from "reactstrap"; class Vault extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.handleChangeETH= this.handleChangeETH.bind(this); this.handleChangeAmountTokenUSD = this.handleChangeAmountTokenUSD.bind(this); this.state = { bigChartData: "data1", miniModal: false, dataModal: [], CPamountETH: 0, CPamountTokenUSD: 0, } } setBgChartData = name => { this.setState({ bigChartData: name }); }; toggleModal = (modalState, id, tokens, ETH) => { this.setState({ [modalState]: !this.state[modalState], dataModal: [id, tokens, ETH] }); console.log(this.state.dataModal); }; handleChangeETH(e) { this.setState({CPamountETH: (e.target.value * 10**18).toLocaleString( 'fullwide', { useGrouping: false })}); } handleChangeAmountTokenUSD(e) { this.setState({CPamountTokenUSD: (e.target.value * 10**20).toLocaleString( 'fullwide', { useGrouping: false })}); } createCP = receiver => { const web3 = this.props.web3; const instanceColl = this.props.instanceColl; if (this.props.web3Available !== "false") { web3.eth.getCoinbase().then(result => instanceColl.methods.openCP(this.state.CPamountTokenUSD).send( {from: result, value: this.state.CPamountETH}))}; }; closeCP = receiver => { const web3 = this.props.web3; const instanceColl = this.props.instanceColl; if (this.props.web3Available !== "false") { web3.eth.getCoinbase().then(result => instanceColl.methods.closeCP(receiver).send( {from: result}))}; }; render() { var CP1 = ["0,00", "0,00"]; var CP2 = ["0,00", "0,00"]; var CP3 = ["0,00", "0,00"]; var CP4 = ["0,00", "0,00"]; if (this.props.individualCPs.length > 0) { CP1 = this.props.individualCPs[0]; CP2 = this.props.individualCPs[1]; CP3 = this.props.individualCPs[2]; CP4 = this.props.individualCPs[3]; } console.log(CP1) return ( <>
{this.props.indexCP} Collateral Positions
ID Tokens Collateral Liquidation rate
1 {(CP1[1]/10**20).toLocaleString( undefined, {minimumFractionDigits: 2, maximumFractionDigits:2})} LUSD {(CP1[0]/10**18).toLocaleString( undefined, {minimumFractionDigits: 2, maximumFractionDigits:2})} ETH {isNaN((CP1[1]/10**20)/(CP1[0]/10**18)) ? (
0,00 USD
):(
{((CP1[1]/10**20)/(CP1[0]/10**18) * 1.5).toLocaleString( undefined, {minimumFractionDigits: 2, maximumFractionDigits:2})} USD
)}
2 {(CP2[1]/10**20).toLocaleString( undefined, {minimumFractionDigits: 2, maximumFractionDigits:2})} LUSD {(CP2[0]/10**18).toLocaleString( undefined, {minimumFractionDigits: 2, maximumFractionDigits:2})} ETH {((CP2[1]/10**20)/(CP2[0]/10**18) * 1.5).toLocaleString( undefined, {minimumFractionDigits: 2, maximumFractionDigits:2})} USD
3 {(CP3[1]/10**20).toLocaleString( undefined, {minimumFractionDigits: 2, maximumFractionDigits:2})} LUSD {(CP3[0]/10**18).toLocaleString( undefined, {minimumFractionDigits: 2, maximumFractionDigits:2})} ETH {((CP3[1]/10**20)/(CP3[0]/10**18) * 1.5).toLocaleString( undefined, {minimumFractionDigits: 2, maximumFractionDigits:2})} USD
4 {(CP4[1]/10**20).toLocaleString( undefined, {minimumFractionDigits: 2, maximumFractionDigits:2})} LUSD {(CP4[0]/10**18).toLocaleString( undefined, {minimumFractionDigits: 2, maximumFractionDigits:2})} ETH {((CP4[1]/10**20)/(CP4[0]/10**18) * 1.5).toLocaleString( undefined, {minimumFractionDigits: 2, maximumFractionDigits:2})} USD
Current rate: {(this.props.rateUSD/10**2).toLocaleString( undefined, {minimumFractionDigits: 2, maximumFractionDigits:2})} USD
Create Collateral Position
{" "} USD Token amount ETH amount Collateral details
Collateral amount Liquidation price Current Rate
{(this.state.CPamountETH / 10**18).toLocaleString( undefined, {minimumFractionDigits: 2, maximumFractionDigits:2})} ETH {isNaN(this.state.CPamountTokenUSD/this.state.CPamountETH) ? (
0,00 USD
):(
{((this.state.CPamountTokenUSD / 10**2)/ (this.state.CPamountETH) * 1.5).toLocaleString( undefined, {minimumFractionDigits: 2, maximumFractionDigits:2})} USD
)} 		{(this.props.rateUSD/10**2).toLocaleString( undefined, {minimumFractionDigits: 2, maximumFractionDigits:2})} USD
{/* Start Mini Modal */} this.toggleModal("miniModal")} >

Close collateral position {this.state.dataModal[0]+1}

Tokens burn: {(this.state.dataModal[1]/10**20).toLocaleString( undefined, {minimumFractionDigits: 2, maximumFractionDigits:2})}

ETH receive: {(this.state.dataModal[2]/10**18).toLocaleString( undefined, {minimumFractionDigits: 2, maximumFractionDigits:2})}

{/* End Mini Modal */}
); } } export default Vault;
